► Module Ft.Xml.XPath._comparisons

Functions:
eq, ge, gt, le, lt, ne

Functions

eq(a, b)
eq(a, b) -- Same as a == b
ge(a, b)
ge(a, b) -- Same as a >= b
gt(a, b)
gt(a, b) -- Same as a > b
le(a, b)
le(a, b) -- Same as a <= b
lt(a, b)
lt(a, b) -- Same as a < b
ne(a, b)
ne(a, b) -- Same as a != b
